description: Enterprise techniques used by MURKYTOP, ATT&CK software S0233 v1.1
name: MURKYTOP (S0233)

techniques.comment: MURKYTOP has the capability to retrieve information about users on remote hosts.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to delete local files.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to scan for open ports on hosts in a connected network.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to retrieve information about shares on remote hosts.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to retrieve information about groups.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to identify remote hosts on connected networks.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to schedule remote AT jobs.[1]
MURKYTOP has the capability to retrieve information about the OS.[1]
